Title: The Cook, the Steve, the Gayle, & Her Lover
Writer: Mike Benner (story), Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Nora Smith
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: When Bob throws a dinner party, Gayle takes advantage of the opportunity to introduce her new love interest to the family; a long-standing feud is revealed.
